sections.heading: to 44-7-22 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 2001, ch. 227, § 33 repealed 44-7-1 through 44-7-22 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1971, ch. 168, §§ 1 to 23, the former Uniform Arbitration Act, effective July 1, 2001. For provisions of former sections,seethe 2000 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For present comparable provisions,see44-7A-1 NMSA 1978 et seq.
